```{r setup, include = FALSE}
options(tidyverse.quiet = TRUE)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)

bees <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load("2022-01-11")
```

```{r}
skimr::skim(bees$colony)
head(bees$colony)
unique(bees$colony$months)
```

```{r}
# colonies by state
bees$colony |> 
  filter(months == "January-March" & state != "United States") |>
  mutate(year = parse_number(year)) |> 
  group_by(state) |> 
  slice_max(order_by = colony_n, n = 10) |> 
  ungroup() |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = colony_n, color = state)) + 
  geom_line()
```
